name: Little Snake IO
description:
Little Snake IO also has a another type of side game however that runs in conjunction with the main game. Instead of controlling the gargantuan snakes, you can take control of a cute Juja bug that flies in the sky!
Fly around the map with your Juja bug and use your left click button to land on the ground to collect orbs - be careful though as your Juju bug travels at a much slower pace when grounded! Try to collect nectar and complete the various challenges set.
